markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Peafowl Strut](/Feats.aspx?ID=1748) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 129 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Peafowl Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=1739)

**Requirements**
You are in Peafowl Stance.

</column>

---

You slowly move across the battlefield with dangerous grace. Step twice and then Strike. The Strike must be made with the sword required by Peafowl Stance.
name: Peafowl Strut
